name: Gun Appetit
description:
Cook and slay zombies

Add variety to their diets
Survive all the hordes of zombies
Become a Master Chef
Defeat the final boss

Controls
• Arrows or WASD - move
• Mouse - interact and control weapon
• E - opens the cooking menu




Originally made for LudumDare #41
by Nyu Studios  (@enriquewr, @nyunesu, @biemorth)
